sentence.Network_en: We still do; living in a world in which underclared aggression, war, hypocrisy, chicanery, anarchy and impending immolation are part of our daily lives, we all want a code to live by.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们仍然有这种感觉; 生活在一个不宣而战的侵略 、 战争 、 虚伪 、 诈骗 、 混乱以及迫在眉睫的杀戮充斥着我们日常生活的世界里, 我们都想有一种能赖以生存的准则.

sentence.Network_en: The Emperor had these clay figures made instead of burying slave - workers alive as immolation.
sentence.Network_cn: 秦始皇用泥塑造了这批俑,没有活埋奴隶作为殉葬.
